item.title: My NPC Error
item.dc:creator: @GuNtRiX GuNtRiX
item.description:
@GuNtRiX wrote:

Hi
Ive added a NPC to say whether someone is online but it always says im offline when im online
Here is my code

if (npcs[i].npcType == 21) { if (misc.random2(25) <= 3) { npcs[i].updateRequired = true; npcs[i].textUpdateRequired = true; if (PlayerHandler.isPlayerOn("Oli ")){ npcs[i].textUpdate = "Owner Oli is ONLINE"; } else{ npcs[i].textUpdate = "Owner Oli is OFFLINE"; } } }
My compiler finds no errors

Read full topic
